resources:
Quize App
Banner image depicting Ancient Egyptian art Do you want to travel back to Ancient Egypt?
Image depicting Ancient Egyptian hieroglyphics
1. The city where the Great Pyramids are located is: Cairo Giza Alexandria Luxor 1. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 1.
2. Anubis was identified as the god of (Pick Two): the crops the dead prosperity the underworld 2. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 2.
3. The head of Anubis is depicted as what animal in illustrations? Cat Beetle Eagle Jackal 3. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 3.
4. Which of the following symbolized eternal life in Ancient Egypt? The Ankh The Scarab The Sphinx The Sistrum 4. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 4.
5. Hieroglyphic text is read only from right to left. True False 5. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 5.
6. The bust of Nefertiti is widely recognizable. What is oddly unique about this Ancient Egyptian artifact? Image depicting bust of Nefertiti Her face appears perfectly symmetrical Her nose is missing Her eyes are closed Her eyes are missing 6. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 6.
7. Queen Cleopatra VII is most famously associated with which two of her lovers/spouses? (Pick Two): Khufu Pepi II Marc Antony Julius Caesar 7. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 7.
8. Sharing a moniker with a city in Tennessee, this was identified as the first capital city of Ancient Egypt? (Hint: Think Elvis Presley) 8. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 8.
9. The Great Sphinx guard the tomb of this pharaoh. Khafre Khufu Hatshepsut Ramses I 9. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 9.
10. The intact tomb of King Tut, the Boy King, was discovered by Howard Carter in 1922 in the aptly named: Nile Valley Valley of the Kings Sinai Peninsula Nile Delta 10. Excellent choice! Try again on Question 10.
